title: Pixel Art Full-Body FANTASTIC Characters: 450 Sprites in 3 Sizes
description: 450 Unique Characters: A massive selection of full-body sprites featuring 150 different designs in three different resolutions. Ideal for creating a diverse and engaging cast.
longDescription:
Description:

Bring your fantasy world to life with this comprehensive collection of 150 unique and diverse full-body pixel art characters. With 450 sprites across three sizes, this asset pack offers a wide variety of fantastical characters to suit any game. Whether you're developing an RPG, platformer, or roguelike, these characters are designed to fit seamlessly into your project.

Key Features:

  • 450 Unique Characters: A massive selection of full-body sprites featuring 150 different designs in three different resolutions. Ideal for creating a diverse and engaging cast.
  • Transparent Backgrounds: Each sprite comes with a transparent background, allowing for easy integration into your game environment without any extra editing.
  • Versatile Resolutions: The three resolution options (1024x1024, 500x500, and 256x256 pixels) offer flexibility, letting you choose the best size for your project.
  • Multiple Game Applications: Perfect for RPGs, platformers, adventure games, and more. These sprites can fit a variety of styles and genres.

Ease of Integration:

The transparent PNG files make it easy to integrate these characters into your project. You can quickly drag and drop them into most game engines, saving you time and effort.

Ongoing Support and Feedback:

As this is the second version of the asset pack, you can expect regular updates and enhancements based on user feedback. We value your input and encourage you to leave reviews and ratings to help us improve and provide the best possible asset pack for your needs.

Contact Information:

For any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at adeiliz2023@gmail.com. We're here to support you and ensure you get the most out of this asset pack.

Make your fantasy game unforgettable with this expansive collection of pixel art characters. Get your pack today and start creating!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Blueprints: 450 items in 3 resolutions

Texture Resolutions: 1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: Transparent backgrounds, 32 bits, PNG
